thread.title: Techs: phone warning spooks markets, ZTE slams US ban

title: Techs: phone warning spooks markets, ZTE slams US ban
text:
Techs: phone warning spooks markets, ZTE slams US ban 4:07pm BST - 01:48 
Smartphone worries unnerve the tech sector as the world's largest contract chipmaker warns of slowing demand and China's ZTE says a US ban on the sale of parts and software to the company threatens its survival. Pascale Davies reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Smartphone worries unnerve the tech sector as the world's largest contract chipmaker warns of slowing demand and China's ZTE says a US ban on the sale of parts and software to the company threatens its survival. Pascale Davies reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JXvO4V
